fields.name: compound
fields.title: Compound Identifier
fields.description: The compound identifier must correspond with the metabolic model identifiers.

fields.name: lower
fields.title: Lower Bound
fields.description: The lower bound for the exchange reaction. For models following common practices this is the flux providing the compound to the medium.

fields.name: upper
fields.title: Upper Bound
fields.description: The upper bound for the exchange reaction. For models following common practices this is the flux removing the compound from the medium.

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Optional comment which is not processed further.
